It is Half-Life 2, if you are on this platform you owe it to yourself to buy and play it.
I like this game yes i do

My hours on record is low, because I played the Half-Life 2 Update version instead of this one. 

Yeah, I definitely see why everyone loves this game. Personally, I think it holds up. This game is great. Although, I could've used a little less loading screens, but even that could've have stopped my enjoyment of this game. The first game mainly took place in one setting and then switched locations to Xen in the later part, but this one felt kinda like a fun, war-torn road trip with multiple memorable locations. The story is well-paced and much more engaging than the first.
Bu oyuna incelemeye gerek olduğunu düşünmüyorum. Gelmiş geçmiş en iyi oyunlardan bir tanesi.

One of the best games I have ever played during my life!
17 years after release it is still actual, because game flow is perfect
the best game and game series of all time
you have probably seen a thousand of they so just play that's it :)

This game saved my life.

I am 34.

My ex-wife and I have a daughter together, and adopted our son together. They are now both 4 years old.

When we were going through our separation, I found myself lost and miserable. I was self destructive. I got so mad one day from everything spiraling out of my control that I punched some concrete in a moment of overwhelming emotion. That caused me to break my 5th metacarpal in my right hand... my working hand... my games hand.. the hand that I held and carried my children to bed with.. The hand I desperately needed to make sure I could continue to provide.

After learning of the severity of my self-inflicted damage, I was borderline suicidal. Keep in mind that just a few months before this, I was the happiest man with no history of depression or anxiety. I have never had fits of rage, or been one to break down and cry, but I was in a low spot that just really buried me from being able to see the light on the other side.

Having nothing better to do, I searched for a game I could play, ONE HANDED while I recovered. I somehow stumbled upon this game and read some of the reviews. I decided that it had to be worth a shot... I must admit, I didn't beat the game, or play nearly as long as some of you. In fact, I may have only played this game a day or two.. With that being said, after doing so, I had a new found joy and hope for life. I was able to put behind me the pain and suffering that had been cast over me. I was able to experience other peoples joy and happiness. I was able to see the fruits of my "labor". I relaxed for 5 :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: :hillary: minutes to this music long enough to realize that I was going to be okay.
After coming to that realization, I turned the game off, and I went back to work. It hurt my hand like hell but I was motivated. I stopped feeling so damn sorry for myself, and I became the father I needed to be in that moment, not the weak boy I was behaving as.

Today, I am close friend with my kids mother. We don't fight, or argue, or say hurtful things to each other. We are parents, and friends.

I now have 3 kids. My third child is, wait for it, ALSO 4 YEARS OLD. The woman I am with was going through a very similar situation at the time of my own separation, and we just stumbled in to each others life unexpectedly. We have been in a relationship for a year now, and are very happy together.

Moral of the story, you never know what life holds in store for you, and if I would have given up when all the odds were stacked against me, I wouldn't be where I am today. This silly little game helped me realize that.

Thank you

Havn't finished the game but from what ive experienced id recommend it to as many people as possible. It has really good graphics and story, a lot places are confusing and you can get stuck but you always need to think of the weirdest smartest way to get out of it which makes it fun

Да, наконец-то дошёл я до неё. Игра по истине знаменита, особенно отсутствием 3-ей части. Игра стоит своих денег, ходя на самом деле даже окупает. если вы любите сюжетки и стрелялки - это то что надо. Суммарно игра заняла у меня 13 часов, да, для меня это коротковато, но скорее всего ещё пару часов в игре есть (получение всех достижений). Игра - шедевр, не побоюсь этих слов.

Alyx Vance: «I guess you're Freeman.»

Gordon Freeman: «.........»

Я посмотрел титры, закрыл эту игру и почувствовал довольно тягостное ощущение того, что это всё закончилось. Я жил впечатлениями от игры, думал о Гордоне и Аликс - как они там, и что же дальше?
Являясь хоть и экшеном, это настоящее приключение - оно никогда не забывается, как будто то, что происходило в игре, происходило и с тобой. Вот он - сюжет - то что происходит на экране, и ты ступаешь ровно по нему - без раздумий и колебаний насчет того, что встанет у тебя на пути, сколько их, и долго ли тебе идти. 
Можно испугаться в Рейвенхольме и чувствовать себя там неуютно из-за этих хедкрабов и
бегущих упырей-выродков. И подумаешь, что веселее стрелять острыми дисками в живую пехоту.
Но в HL2 так не бывает. Тут нет экшена и взрывов только ради экшена, но есть ради выживания. И сопротивления врагам.
Не всегда понятно, куда пойдет Гордон на следующий уровень, и зачем ему быть именно там, но знаешь, что там будет что-то впечатляющее.

И, честно говоря, менять это впечатление на что бы - то ни было, не хочется. Игра заслужила, чтобы потратить мое время.

the game is fantastic and is really fun to play

when half life 3 tho?
Отличная игра, давно хотел перепройти еще раз, но не было компа, собираюсь дальше пройти эпизоды.
Игра получилась просто отличной. В отличии от первой части здесь появились: интересные персонажи, хорошая графика, атмосфера. Короче всем советую поиграть в этот шедевр. 10/10
doesn't reach the same level of atmosphere as the first but the gameplay makes up for it. Think Max Payne vs Max Payne 3

Honestly every single HL game has raised the bar so high for what a FPS should be, it's been both beautiful and amazing. Valve basically created a new gold standard with every game. The engine is the true prize with each installment, however they also were nice enough to give us a well crafted story line, with characters we care about and enemies we love to hate. If you haven't played this game yet, I suggest you start with the first one, (However you may want to play Black Mesa for the updates.) then Opposing Force, Blue Shift, Half-Life 2, HL2: Episode 1, Episode 2, and then Half-Life: Alyx.

Warning, HL: Alyx has set the bar so high for VR games that once you play it almost nothing will compare.
To put it simply, this game is a masterpiece.

3

i'm not good at writing reviews, but the love and effort that was put into this game, so much as the smallest detail is insane. I beat this game in 9.2 hours but i enjoyed MOST of it, the water hazard chapter is just you running around. Onto my favorite part, the city 17 citadel, Yes the big structure at the start of the game is called the citadel. Anyway, this section is so unique and I've never seen a game do this so well like half life 2. Without spoiling it too much, you reach the top and the view is amazing.
The boss fight is kinda disappointing game-play wise but story wise its amazing. 9/10 Amazing game for its time.
Innovazione, fisica realistica, storia stupenda....FPS mitico ed innovativo! CAPOLAVORO.
Un clásico muy avanzado a su época. Gran ambientación y gráficos.

Bu oyun bir başyapıt,öncelikle bu oyunun şu ana kadar çok çok fazla incelendiğini biliyorum o yüzden oyun dünyasına kazandırdıkları üzerinde durmak yerine sadece bana hissettirdiklerinden bahsedeceğim.Birtek su üzerinde gittiğimiz kısımlarda yani başlarda tempo biraz düşük geldiği için çok sıkıldım fakat onun dışında hikaye sürekli ilerlediği ve bölüm dizaynı,silahlar,düşmanlar tam ayarında olduğu için çok zevk aldım,özellikle finale doğru oyunun temposu bir hayli yükseldi.Düşmanlarda kumdan çıkan yaratıklar sinirimi acayip bozdu ve bunlar neden var oyunda diye çokça sorguladım tabii ilerde anladım onun da sebebini,korku dozajı bir önceki oyundan daha fazla,özellikle ravenholm bölümü gerçekten gerilimin en çok yaşandığı bölümdü,çok güzel tasarlanmış.Silahlarımızdan gravity(yer çekimi) silahı bu oyunun en temel mekaniklerini oluşturuyor ve kullanması çok zevkli.Hikaye akışı da gayet iyi dediğim gibi özellikle sonlarda bir yerlere bağlanıyor hikaye, henüz episode 1 ve episode 2 yi oynamadım fakat sadece bu oyun üzerinden konuşursam half life 1 finalindeki xen bölümü beni çok daha fazla etkilemişti hem boss hem de bölüm dizaynı çok daha iyiydi bence, ep.1 ve ep.2yi oynadıktan sonra editle düşüncelerimi eklerim.Eğer hala almadıysanız bu fiyata kesinlikle düşünmeyin.Puanım 8,9/10

Ну что тут можно сказать? Есть хорошие игры. Есть отличные игры. А есть игры вечные. И, судя по тому, насколько хорошо Half-Life 2 играется спустя 17 лет после выхода - это безусловно как раз такой случай. Игра не потеряла и крупицы своего шарма и глубины. Это одна из моих любимых игр, которую еще четырнадцать лет назад я прошел не один раз и, видимо, пройду еще не однажды за свою жизнь. Однозначно и безоговорочно - шедевр в своем жанре!
